summary: A New York City detective teams up with a federal agent and a state trooper to bust up a drug ring.
cast: Cliff Gorman|Don Blakely|Richard Gere|Edward Grover|Joe Spinell|Marilyn Chris|Mimi Cecchini|Carl Don|Arnold Soboloff|Allan Rich|Billy Longo|Randy Jurgensen|David Gideon|Larry Bryggman|Lenny Montana|Marie Puma|Filomena Spagnuolo|Lee Steele|Steve Vignari|Stephen Zulick
title: Strike Force
